text: Matija Češković (born May 20, 1981) is a Croatian professional basketball Guard who last played for Šanac Karlovac. ==External links== * Matija Ceskovic Player Profile on Realgm.com * Matija Ceskovic Basketball Player Profile on Eurobasket.com ==References== Category:1981 births Category:Croatian men's basketball players Category:Living people Category:Point guards Category:KK Zrinjevac players Category:HKK Široki players Category:Kolossos Rodou B.C. players Category:Kaposvári KK players Category:KK Bosna Royal players Category:PVSK Panthers players
title: Matija Češković
